question: What is the name of the Mental Health Rehabilitation Helpline, to be launched by the Social Justice Ministry?
explanation:
Union Social Justice and Empowerment Minister Thaawarchand Gehlot is set to launch the Mental Health Rehabilitation Helpline "KIRAN‚Äù.
This 24x7 Toll-Free Helpline has been developed by the Department of Empowerment of Persons with Disabilities, to provide psychological support and rehabilitation services to persons with Mental Illness, across the country.
